org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream

类 DataStreamSource<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.DataStream<T>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.SingleOutputStreamOperator<T>
        • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.DataStreamSource<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - Type of the elements in the DataStream created from the this source.

    @Public
public class DataStreamSource<T>
extends SingleOutputStreamOperator<T>
    The DataStreamSource represents the starting point of a DataStream.

      • setParallelism

        public DataStreamSource<T> setParallelism(int parallelism)
        从类复制的说明: SingleOutputStreamOperator
        Sets the parallelism for this operator. The degree must be 1 or more.
        覆盖:
        setParallelism 在类中 SingleOutputStreamOperator<T>
        参数:
        parallelism - The parallelism for this operator.
        返回:
        The operator with set parallelism.
